item.title: About me
item.author: tufaerdogan@gmail.com (Erdogan Tufa)
item.description:
My name is Erdogan Tufa. I’m a full-stack .NET developer who is passionate about design patterns (in the real world), SOLID principles, and clean code practices.
Testimonials Giovanni Degiorgi Business Analyst I had the pleasure to work with Erdo for several projects, starting from simple webpage to more complex server client architectures. He is confident about technical concepts definition as well as the execution of the real work.
